code: const API_KEY=process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY;export const fetchWeatherData=async(lat,lon)=>{const response=await fetch("https://api.weatherapi.com/v1/forecast.json?key=".concat(API_KEY,"&q=").concat(lat,",").concat(lon,"&days=5&aqi=yes&alerts=yes&lang=es"));if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Error al obtener los datos meteorológicos");}return await response.json();};
